overview: Filmed in Melbourne during the first several months of the COVID-19 pandemic, Sleeping Monster explores the prosaic beauty of King Gizzard & the Lizard Wizardâ€™s studio routine. Featuring demos from the album "Changes", plus the track "Change" recorded live in the studio on film.
tagline: A short film about King Gizzard & the Lizard Wizard
title: Sleeping Monster
